briefdescription.para: Rotation around the X axis.
Rotation around the Y axis.
Rotation around the Z axis.
Scaling of the image.
Values that represent different animation parameter.
The animation is finished.
The animation is in the delay mode.
The animation is currently running.
Values that represent different states during an animation.
Number of animation parameters.
Counter that is equal to the current step in the animation.
Boolean that is true if the animation is running.
Descriptions of the animation of specific animation parameters.
Callback that is executed after the animation ends.
Callback that is executed after every step of the animation.
Cancel move animation.

detaileddescription.para: Stops any running animation at the current position regardless of the progress made so far. Disables all animation parameters set using setupAnimation and mark the animation as stopped.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current animation step measured in ticks since the call to startAnimation().

detaileddescription.para: The steps during the initial delay are also counted.

briefdescription.para: Gets whether or not the animation is running.

simplesect.para: true if the animation is running.

briefdescription.para: Associates an action to be performed when the animation ends.

parameterdescription.para: The callback to be executed. The callback will be given a reference to the AnimationTextureMapper.

briefdescription.para: Associates an action to be performed for every step in the animation.

detaileddescription.para: Will not be called during the delay period.

parameterdescription.para: The callback to be executed. The callback will be given a reference to the AnimationTextureMapper.

memberdef.argsstring: (AnimationParameter parameter, float endValue, uint16_t duration, uint16_t delay, EasingEquation progressionEquation=&EasingEquations::linearEaseNone)
memberdef.name: setupAnimation

briefdescription.para: Sets up the animation for a specific parameter (angle/scale) for the next animation.

detaileddescription.para: The specific parameter is chosen using the AnimationType enum. AnimationTypes that are not setup using this method will keep their value during the animation.

parameterdescription.para: The parameter of the TextureMapper that should be animated.
The end value for the parameter.
The duration for the animation of the parameter. Specified in ticks.
The delay before the animation of the parameter starts. Specified in ticks.
(Optional) the progression equation for the animation of this parameter. Default is EasingEquations::linearEaseNone.

briefdescription.para: Starts the animation from the current position to the specified end angles/scale, as specified by one or more calls to setupAnimation().
Called periodically by the framework if the Drawable instance has subscribed to timer ticks.
A TextureMapper with animation capabilities.

detaileddescription.para: Note that the angles of the TextureMapper is normalized to lie in the range [0; 2PI[ at the beginning at the animation. The end angles should be relative to this and are limited to values in the range [-32.7; 32.7].
